I am Petra Kolarič

About me

Collaboration

The strength of the team is each individual member. Through a flexible framework with a shared vision we can reach the goal we are aiming for.

Creativity

Creativity has no boundaries, businesses usually have. Let's meet in the middle to find innovative solutions to meet customer's needs.

Communication

Emails or telephone calls, languages or hand gestures? No problem, I am precise and punctual, just like a Swiss watch.

Finding solutions

Where there is a will there is a way. With a magic wand (mouse) in hand, we can achieve anything.

My Services

Product management

Strategic and tactical duties. Conducting research, developing strategy, planning, coordinating development.

Design

Producing a host of ideas, selecting the best ones, and selling them to the other members of the team and to clients.

Branding

Elevating the company's brand to a whole new level with clear data analysis, metrics, and data points.

Testimony

Petra participated in the initial project inquiries and at further price negotiations in a very active and precise way. She prepared many customer meetings and took part at fashion fairs in Munich, Milan, Paris, Florence. Besides that, Miss Kolarič managed and kept all data updated in our multiple development systems. Through her employment, we experience Ms. Kolaric as a very goal-oriented and well-organized employee.

Michael R., Cheif Procurement Officer
Michael Pachleitner Group

It is a real pleasure to work with Petra. She came up with fresh up-to-trend design ideas. Manage to create our Facebook page and web design even faster as agreed. We will definitely keep in touch for future projects.

Daniel H., Chief Executive Officer, Deval d.o.o.

Petra is such a quick learner and a hard worker. She is very talented and for that, it's very easy to work with her. I share compliments received because, in the end, Petra managed all the process by herself. I know our clients are very satisfied with the work she did for us.

Vesna K., Andromeda NGO
